title: Bihar firm turns focus on migrating workforce, MICA students chip in
description: A team of six students, led by their mentors, worked on building an online brand that positions Karekeba as the 'Go-To' organization for the start-ups of Bihar and Jharkhand for mentorship and value-addition.

title: Covid-19 cases in India | Coronavirus: PM Modi calls for vaccine festival from Apr 11-14; night curfew in many cities- Top developments
description: PM Narendra Modi told chief ministers that containing a human host is a way to contain coronavirus. We have resources, experience now and 'test, track, treat, COVID-appropriate behaviour' will help bring down infection peak, PM Modi said.

title: Reserve 10-25% beds for Covid-19 patients: Health dept to pvt hospitals
description: Concerned over sudden rise in Covid-19 cases, state health department has asked all private hospitals across Bihar to reserve 10-25% beds for treatment of infected patients, an official said on Thursday

title: After Maha, Odisha & Jharkhand Run Out of Vaccines as Cases Surge
description: India on Thursday, 8 April, reported its highest-ever tally with 1,26,789 new COVID-19 cases.

title: COVID vaccine: 'No shortage. 43 million doses in pipeline', says Harsh Vardhan
description: Amidst rise in cases, several states including Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Odisha, Andhra Pradesh, and Jharkhand, claim that they are facing coronavirus vaccine shortage.The Union Health Ministry said that cumulatively 9,01,98,673 vaccine doses have been administered through 13,77,304 sessions

title: 1-2 days Covid-19 vaccines stock left: Jharkhand health minister
description: Banna Gupta said, "We have stock for the next 1-2 days. We have made a request to the Union Home Minister and I am hopeful that he will provide the vaccines."

title: COVID-19 vaccination drive to go contactless with Aadhaar-based face recognition: All you need to know
description: India is looking at adding Aadhaar-based facial recognition in an effort to make its COVID-19 vaccination procedure contactless. The Unique Identity Authority of India (UIDAI) has already started a pilot project in Jharkhand to test the efficacy of the facial-recognition system, which is based on data obtained from the Aadhaar database.Get latest Healthcare online at cnbctv18.com

title: Fearing lockdown, several migrant workers in Delhi head for native places
description: New Delhi [India], April 8 (ANI): Amidst lockdown fears triggered by the imposition of night curfew in the national capital following a surge in Covid-19 cases, several migrant workers were seen leaving Delhi and heading towards their native places.

title: Covid-19 lockdowns return, with a change: migrants are now mostly single, male
description: While there is no such official nationwide data, experts note that the migration back to workplaces since the end of the first lockdown has been increasingly single, male migration, leaving families behind.

title: School Closed in Jharkhand amid COVID-19 surge, JAC 10th and 12th Exam to continue as per Schedule, Get Details Here
description: Jharkhand Schools Closed due to COVID: With the much aggressive 2nd Wave of COVID-19 leading   to surge in cases across the country, the Jharkhand State Government has decided to close down schools in the state as a precautionary measure. On the other hand, JAC Matric and Intermediate Exams 2021 for 10th and 12th Exam are expected to continue as per the timetable or exam date sheet released earlier. Get Complete Details Here.

title: India records spike of 1.15 lakh new COVID-19 cases, 630 deaths in past 24 hours
description: According to the Health Ministry data released at 8 AM, the death toll increased by 630 to 1,66,177. The is the biggest one-day rise in cases in the country ever since the pandemic began.

title: 418 active cases of COVID-19 detected in single day in Jharkhand
description: In Jharkhand, COVID-19 cases continue to rise. A record number of 418 active cases were detected in a single day taking the total count to 2,254 active cases in the State.

title: They'll bring more glory to the state: Hockey Jharkhand President after team wins 11th Sub Junior Men National Championship
description: New Delhi [India], March 30 (ANI): Last week, Hockey Jharkhand made history when they were crowned champions of the 11th Hockey India Sub Junior Men National Championship 2021. Many of Hockey Jharkhand's players had to rise above challenging circumstances -- at home and on the turf -- to make a name for themselves. Even in the Final, they were up against favourites and hosts Hockey Haryana but emerged winners following a shootout.

title: Jharkhand BJP seeks FIR against Cong MLA over breach of COVID-19 norms on Holi
description: Hazaribagh (Jharkhand) [India], March 30 (ANI): Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has demanded an FIR against Jharkhand's Barkagaon MLA Amba Prasad for violating COVID-19 guidelines on Holi put forth by the state.

title: Jharkhand minister flouts Covid norms, attends gathering to celebrate Holi Milan
description: Jharkhand Labour Minister Satyanand Bhokta was caught on camera flouting coronavirus guidelines on Friday when he visited his constituency, Chatra, and attended a congregation to observe the Holi Milan event.
